issue.title: Add "extraction manager" assignment in "diffusion" view.
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

With the re-design on v4 roles and rights, we missed a feature port from v2:
Since all right on a resources are grouped in the "resource edit view", a "diffusion manager" (the person in charge of all parameters of diffusion of a resource) cannot choose the "extraction manager" as he may not be "resources manager".

We propose to add this role assignment in the "diffusion" view. (as in v2).

Plus: it really makes sense to have this in the diffusion screen, as it offers a complete view of diffusion parameters.



**Fixed versions :** 4.4.1

comments.body:
**Original author :** Villemagne Jérôme

TC accept that enhancement but remarks that that role should be duplicated and not moved.
